info.name: Book Management System API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Digital Book Store Management System.

**Base URL**: `http://localhost:9080`

**Authentication**: Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token. First register/login, then use the returned accessToken.

**Services**:
- Authentication Service (/api/v1/auth)
- Book Service (/api/v1/book)
- Inventory Service (/api/v1/inventory)
- Order Service (/api/v1/order)
- Review Service (/api/v1/reviews)
- User Service (/api/v1/users)
